name: trello_move_card
description: Move a Trello card to a different list on the same or different board.

parameters.name: target_list_id
parameters.description: Target list ID to move the card to

steps.code: const resp = await fetch('/1/cards/{{card_id}}?idList={{target_list_id}}', { method: 'PUT', credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Move failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const card = await resp.json(); return { success: true, card_id: card.id, card_name: card.name, new_list_id: '{{target_list_id}}', url: card.shortUrl || card.url }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Move card via Trello API
